item.description: Background Important Relations her parents [[Lyra and Fhaonik Eillir]] her siblings, [[Gormon]] and [[Syrja]]

they are the lorekeepers in the village [[Heilar]] grew up in a very lovely elderly elven couple (surprisingly, they both look old - which is uncommon for elves) we get lots of cookies from them their children [[Gormon]], [[Syrja]], and [[People & Groups/Enren Eillir]] Important Relations
lives in the village [[Heilar]] grew up in got sick because of the corrupted water Important Relations Her father [[Oland Kelvaris]]
